map:
plugin_status ready
plugin_identifier org.lockss.plugin.pub2web.ms.MicrobiologySocietyJournalsPlugin
plugin_version 19
plugin_parent org.lockss.plugin.pub2web.Pub2WebJournalsPlugin
plugin_parent_version 27
plugin_name Microbiology Society Journals Plugin
au_name "Microbiology Society Journals Plugin, Base URL %s, Journal ID %s, Volume %s", base_url, journal_id, volume_name
text/html_crawl_filter_factory org.lockss.plugin.pub2web.ms.MsHtmlCrawlFilterFactory s
text/html_filter_factory org.lockss.plugin.pub2web.ms.MsHtmlHashFilterFactory
text/html_link_extractor_factory org.lockss.plugin.pub2web.ms.MsHtmlLinkExtractorFactory
text/html_link_rewriter_factory org.lockss.plugin.pub2web.ms.MsHtmlLinkRewriterFactory
au_substance_url_pattern
"^%sdeliver/fulltext/%s/[^?]+\.pdf", base_url, journal_id
